name: Monster Attack
overview: A Space Invader/Gorf style shooter where you are at Carnival but one where every joke counts. The aliens have camouflaged themselves as smiling masks, but underneath they are grim death dealing machines. They must be shot down mercilessly and not allowed to have the last laugh. Beware, they come from all directions, even below. Published in Italy as Le Machere in Supplementi Sipe - i Magnifici 10 (Settembre 1984).
